enWisdom: The worst [type of] wealth is that which earns censure

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْأَمْوَالِ مَا لَمْ يُغْنِ عَنْ صَاحِبِهِ
enWisdom: The worst wealth is that which does not benefit [and fulfil the need of] its owner

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْمَالِ مَا لَمْ يُنْفَقْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ مِنْهُ وَلَمْ تُؤَدَّ زَكَاتُهُ
enWisdom: The worst wealth is that from which nothing is spent in the way of Allah and the [obligatory] zak?t of which is not paid

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْأَمْوَالِ مَا لَمْ يُخْرَجْ مِنْهُ حَقُّ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The worst wealth is that from which the right of Allah, the Glorified, is not given

Wisdom: أَفْقَرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ قَتَّرَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ مَعَ الْغِنَى وَالسَّعَةِ وَخَلَّفَهُ لِغَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: The poorest of people is one who is stingy with himself despite [his] wealth and affluence, and leaves it behind for others [in the end]
